title: Postseason Webview
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
MLB app is installed
custom_steps: WHEN user taps on Postseason tab
custom_expected:
THEN
- EN/ES webview displays on the Postseason view depending on which language setting your device is on

title: Gameday Preview Link
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
MLB app is installed
AND user is in Postseason View
custom_steps: WHEN user taps on Gameday link for a game in preview
custom_expected: THEN the Gameday preview page will launch for that game

title: Gameday Live Link
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
MLB app is installed
AND user is in Postseason View
custom_steps: WHEN user taps on Gameday link for a live game
custom_expected: THEN the Gameday Live page will launch for that game

title: Gameday Wrap Link
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
MLB app is installed
AND user is in Postseason View
custom_steps: WHEN user taps on Gameday link for a Final game
custom_expected: THEN the Gameday Wrap page will launch for that game

title: Webview EN
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a device is set to EN language 
And user is on postseason webview tab
custom_steps: when a user taps on the Postseason view.
custom_expected: Then the EN URL webview is displayed in the app

title: Webview ES
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a device is set to ES language 
And user is on postseason webview tab
custom_steps: when a user taps on the Postseason view.
custom_expected: Then the ES URL webview is displayed in the app

title: Webview Refresh
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on postseason view tab
custom_steps: When user switches to other tab and comes back back to postseason view tab
custom_expected: Then  Postseason webview should refresh with every tab launch.

title: Default Tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
MLB app is installed
custom_steps: when a user taps on the Postseason tab
custom_expected: THEN it should default to the page's Schedule section

title: Game Sorting
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on the Postseason Schedule tab
and there are Postseason games scheduled for that day
custom_steps:
When the game states are updating
and games are in progress
custom_expected: Then the games in progress will be sorted to the top of the Schedule list

title: MLB.TV Live Link - Entitled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is in Postseason view
and the user is TV-entitled
custom_steps: WHEN user taps on the MLB.TV link for a Live game
custom_expected: Then the TV feed selector for that game will launch

title: MLB.TV Live Link - Not Entitled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is in Postseason view
and the user is not entitled for TV
custom_steps: WHEN user taps on the MLB.TV link for a Live game
custom_expected: Then the TV paywall will launch

title: MLB.TV Archive Link - Entitled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is in Postseason view
and user is TV-entitled
custom_steps: WHEN user taps on MLB.TV link for a game that is Final
custom_expected: Then the archive for that game will launch

title: MLB.TV Archive Link - Not Entitled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is in Postseason view
and user is not entitled for TV
custom_steps: WHEN user taps on MLB.TV link for a game that is Final
custom_expected: Then the TV paywall will launch

title: Series Status
custom_preconds: Given a user has the app installed on iPad
custom_steps:
When a user is on the Team Page for a Postseason team
and views a Postseason game in the top Schedule Module
custom_expected: The user will see the series status text left aligned in the header (NLDS Game 3: CHC leads series 2-0)

title: State for displaying last regular season game
custom_preconds: Given a user has the app installed on iPad
custom_steps:
When a user is on a Team Page for a Postseason team
and views the top Schedule Module
custom_expected:
Then the user will see color header for the Postseason games
and not a color header for the end of the regular season games

title: Broadcast Logos
custom_preconds: Given a user has the app installed
custom_steps:
When the user navs to the Scoreboard view 
and there are Postseason games available

custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see the correct broadcaster logo
Then the user will see the correct broadcaster logo
Then the user will NOT see a broadcaster logo

title: Series Status
custom_preconds: Given the app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user navs to the Scoreboard view
and there are Postseason games available

custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see the correct series status information
relevant to the previously played games

Then the user will see the correct series status information
relevant to the previously played games
Then the series status info will have updated based off the result of that game

title: Updated WS OOTSB
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When a user is in Gameday for a Postseason game
and the game is World Series game
and views the OOTSB
custom_expected:
Then the user will see all of the games of the World Series
and the selected game is highlight in the OOTSB

title: WS OOTSB - Preview
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When a user taps on a World Series game
and views the OOTSB
and the game viewed is in Preview
custom_expected:
then the user will see blue header - rgb 10 30 64
and see the Gm <Number> and Time and Date in the header (GM 5: 10:05 PM Oct 25)
and away team tricode and record
over home team tricode and record
and see the Fox logo

title: WS OOTSB - Live
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When a user taps on a World Series game
and views the OOTSB
and the game viewed is in Live
custom_expected:
then the user will see blue header - rgb 10 30 64
and see the Inning and Series Status Text in the header (Top 4 WS Game 4: CHC leads series, 3-0
and away team tricode and <score>
over home team tricode and <score>
and bases (no fill) and baserunners (gold)
and outs (gold)
and Pitcher (P: <Name>) over At Bat (AB: <Name>)

title: WS OOTSB - Final
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When a user taps on a World Series game
and views the OOTSB
and the game viewed is in Final
custom_expected:
then the user will see blue header - rgb 10 30 64
and see the Gm <Number>:Status and Date (GM 3:Final Oct 25)
and away team tricode and <score>
over home team tricode and <score>

title: Broadcast Logo
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps: When a user views a Postseason Game in Gameday

custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user will see Watch on <Logo> near the back arrow (left aligned)
then the user will see Watch on <Logo> on the same line as the inning numbers

title: Base runners and Outs
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When a user is viewing a game in Gameday
and the game is Postseason

custom_steps_separated.content:
and viewing that game in the the OOTSB
and baserunners and/or outs
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the bases and outs are yellow color - rgb 202 148 44

custom_steps_separated.content:
and viewing another game in the the OOTSB
and baserunners and/or outs
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the bases and outs are grey color - rgba 47 47 47, 0.5

title: WS - Perfect Game
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When a user taps on a Postseason game
and views the OOTSB
and the game viewed is in progress 
and the game is Perfect Game

custom_steps_separated.content: and the game is in progress
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see Inning - Perfect Game (Bot 4 - Perfect Game)
and red pill around the text

then the user will see Final - Perfect Game (Final - Perfect Game)
and red pill around the text

title: WS No-hitters
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When a user taps on a Postseason game
and views the OOTSB
and the game viewed is in progress 
and the game is No-hitter

custom_steps_separated.content: and the game is in progress
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see Inning - No-hitter (Bot 4 - No-hitter)
and red pill around the text

then the user will see Final - No-hitter (Final - No-hitter)
and red pill around the text

title: Reduce number of games shown in schedule module to 3
custom_preconds: Given a user has the app installed
custom_steps:
When usePostseasonSchedule to enabled for a Postseason team
and the user is on that team's page
and is viewing the top schedule module

custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see 3 games in schedule module
and the Schedule button will be the fourth

then the user will see 4 games in schedule module
and the Schedule button will be the fifth

title: Broadcaster Logos
custom_preconds: Given a user has the app installed
custom_steps:
When a user is on a Team Page for a Postseason team
and views the top schedule Module

custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user will see broadcaster logos
then the user will see broadcaster logos
then the user will not see broadcaster logos

title: Series Status
custom_preconds: Given a user has the app installed
custom_steps:
When a user is on a team page for a Postseason team
and is viewing the top schedule module

custom_steps_separated.content: and views a game in preview
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see a the series status text in between the date bar and the game detail
and formatted accordingly (example: ALDS GM 3: NYY leads 2-0

custom_steps_separated.content: and views a game in progress
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see a the series status text in between the date bar and the game detail
and formatted accordingly (example: ALDS GM 3: NYY leads 2-0

custom_steps_separated.content: and views a game in final
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the user will see a the series status text in between the date bar and the game detail
and formatted accordingly (example: ALDS GM 3: NYY leads 2-0

custom_steps:

title: Pitching - Number/Handedness
custom_preconds:
Given MLB app is installed on an iPhone
and there is a live Postseason game
custom_steps:
When the user launches Gameday for the live Postseason game
and is viewing the Gameday Live tab
and the game is in the Top or Bot of an inning
custom_expected: Then the current pitcher's jersey number and handedness will be displayed next to his last name

title: Pitching - Live Stats
custom_preconds:
Given MLB app is installed on an iPhone
and there is a live Postseason game
custom_steps:
When the user launches Gameday for the live Postseason game
and is viewing the Gameday Live tab
and the game is in the Top or Bot of an inning
custom_expected: Then the current pitcher's live game stats (IP, K, P-S) will appear underneath his last name

title: Pitching - Postseason ERA
custom_preconds:
Given MLB app is installed on an iPhone
and there is a live Postseason game
custom_steps:
When the user launches Gameday for the live Postseason game
and is viewing the Gameday Live tab
and the game is in the Top or Bot of an inning
custom_expected:
Then the current pitcher's cumulative Postseason ERA for that year will be displayed next to the current game's stats
and will be marked with "(Postseason)"

title: Pitching - Regular Season Stats
custom_preconds:
Given MLB app is installed on an iPhone
and there is a live Postseason game
custom_steps:
When the user launches Gameday for the live Postseason game
and is viewing the Gameday Live tab
and the game is in the Top or Bot of an inning
custom_expected:
Then the current pitcher's regular season ERA will be displayed underneath his Postseason ERA
but will include a “(Regular Season)” text to the right of it

title: Pitching - No Regular Season Stats
custom_preconds:
Given MLB app is installed on an iPhone
and there is a live Postseason game
custom_steps:
When the user launches Gameday for the live Postseason game
and is viewing the Gameday Live tab
and the game is in the Top or Bot of an inning
and the current pitcher hasn't pitched in the regular season and has no regular season ERA
custom_expected: Then the following should be displayed: “-.-- ERA (Regular Season)”

title: At Bat - Number/Handedness
custom_preconds:
Given MLB app is installed on an iPhone
and there is a live Postseason game
custom_steps:
When the user launches Gameday for the live Postseason game
and is viewing the Gameday Live tab
and the game is in the Top or Bot of an inning
custom_expected: Then the current batter's jersey number and handedness will be displayed next to his last name

title: At Bat - Live Stats
custom_preconds:
Given MLB app is installed on an iPhone
and there is a live Postseason game
custom_steps:
When the user launches Gameday for the live Postseason game
and is viewing the Gameday Live tab
and the game is in the Top or Bot of an inning
custom_expected: Then the current batter's live game stats (hits-atbats, HR, RBI) will appear underneath his last name

title: At Bat - Postseason Stats
custom_preconds:
Given MLB app is installed on an iPhone
and there is a live Postseason game
custom_steps:
When the user launches Gameday for the live Postseason game
and is viewing the Gameday Live tab
and the game is in the Top or Bot of an inning
custom_expected:
Then the current batter's cumulative Postseason stats (AVG, HR, RBI) for that year will be displayed next to the current game's stats
and will be marked with "(Postseason)"

title: At Bat - Regular Season Stats
custom_preconds:
Given MLB app is installed on an iPhone
and there is a live Postseason game
custom_steps:
When the user launches Gameday for the live Postseason game
and is viewing the Gameday Live tab
and the game is in the Top or Bot of an inning
custom_expected:
Then the current batter's regular season stats (AVG, HR, RBI) will be displayed underneath his Postseason stats
but will include a “(Regular Season)” text to the right of it

title: At Bat - No Regular Season Stats
custom_preconds:
Given MLB app is installed on an iPhone
and there is a live Postseason game
custom_steps:
When the user launches Gameday for the live Postseason game
and is viewing the Gameday Live tab
and the game is in the Top or Bot of an inning
and the current batter has no plate appearances/at bats in the regular season
custom_expected: Then the following will be displayed: .000 AVG, 0 HR, 0 RBI (Regular Season)

title: MLBALL User without MVPD-auth - MLB.TV EPG
custom_preconds: Given there is a live Postseason  US feed
custom_steps:
When the user is logged in with an MLBALL account
and attempts to access the Postseason US feed from the MLB.TV EPG

(tap game tile to bring up feed selector)
custom_expected: Then they will be taken to the Postseason MVPD auth flow webview

title: MLBALL User without MVPD-auth - Scoreboard
custom_preconds: Given there is a live Postseason US feed
custom_steps:
When the user is logged in with an MLBALL account
and attempts to access the Postseason US feed from the Scoreboard

(expand game drawer for Postseason, and then tap the MLB.TV deep link to bring up feed selector)
custom_expected: Then they will be taken to the Postseason MVPD auth flow webview

title: MLBALL User without MVPD-auth - Team Page
custom_preconds: Given there is a live Postseason US feed
custom_steps:
When the user is logged in with an MLBALL account
and attempts to access the Postseason US feed from any Team Page

(tap MLB.TV deep link from top schedule snapshot to bring up feed selector)
custom_expected: Then they will be taken to the Postseason MVPD auth flow webview

title: MLBALL User without MVPD-auth - Gameday Videos
custom_preconds: Given there is a live Postseason US feed
custom_steps:
When the user is logged in with an MLBALL account
and attempts to access the Postseason US feed from Gameday Videos

(while Postseason is live, nav to Gameday Videos tab, and select US feed)
custom_expected: Then they will be taken to the Postseason MVPD auth flow webview

title: MLBALL User - Successful MVPD auth - MLB.TV EPG
custom_preconds: Given there is a live Postseason US feed
custom_steps:
When the user is logged in with an MLBALL account that does not have MVPD auth
and attempts to access the Postseason US feed from the MLB.TV EPG
(tap game tile to bring up feed selector)
and successfully links their account via the auth flow
custom_expected: Then the user will be taken to the stream

custom_preconds: Given there is a live Postseason  US feed
custom_steps:

title: TV-Entitled User with MVPD auth - MLB.TV EPG

custom_steps:
When the user is logged in with a TV-entitled account that has already successfully MVPD-authed
